page.title: 03STOURBRIDGE SHOPPING CENTRE2
page.content: The Crown Centre was opened in 1985. In the Centre there is a large supermarket called Presto,a{market} hall,a new library,the Town Hall and many empty shop units.The library has a childrens section on the ground floor and an adult section upstairs. The Market Hall has been modernised but keeps its old fashioned look.The Town Hall was built in 1886 and the red brick facade has been preserved while the hall itself has been rebuilt. The main shopping street is the High Street.Unil 1968 all{traffic}used this route through the town.In 1968 a{ring {road}was built.Now the High Street is closed to traffic on Saturdays.The High Street has many small shops but only one department store,Owen Owen. This may limit the appeal of{trade}in Stourbridge.
